problem.markdown:
>>The consistency-time charts (these are the charts on the left side of the page) show total values for which level of the Health System? (2 attempts)<<
(x) A. National ( ) B. Regional ( ) C. District ( ) D. Facility
[explanation] The chart shows the values of the National level of the Health System. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: The consistency-time charts (these are the charts on the left side of the page) show total values for which level of the Health System? (2 attempts)

div.p: The chart shows the values of the National level of the Health System.
